name: Candy Jam Match Three Puzzle Game
name_original: Candy Jam Match Three Puzzle Game
description:
Download Candy Jam Mania - the game that is super easy to play, but hard to put down!

Swipe your finger to match three or more candy pieces horizontally or vertically to clear them. Rack up as many points as you can in 60 seconds!

Challenge yourself and your friends in multiplayer mode in this fun and addictive match three puzzle game.

FEATURES:

- Simple and fun one-touch gameplay
- Challenge your Facebook friends
- Play in multiplayer tournaments
- Enjoy amazing graphics and sound
- Match three style puzzle game
- Game Center leaderboard

Download it today and get in on the fun!
